channel.title: Some questions
channel.description:
1. how can i make my barrage that you will stand still for like 20 secs? same with entangle. tbh someone got the code for the bind? :p cause the seconds willnot work :S
2. how to chanse the max hit of range and melee?
3. How can i make it that the max stat is 99 and max cb 126? I can set it to 99 but than i m cb 185 :S help please :p
4. How can i stop massclicking or cant i stop that???
5. how set autoban on noclip/setitem Please help me :wub:

@Codesoft wrote:

If you used a diffrent source all of this would be easy but since it seems you wouldnt want to , i can tell you what your ment to do but i have completely forgot how to , for number 4 change the hit cap to 5 secs per hit or more, number 5 there should be a tutorial on it called death to no clipers or somthing (unsure) number 1 im unsure about,Number 2 i forgot what number 2 was so sorry but i hope you get the hang of it.
